duties_responsibilities.duty: Support development of innovative diagnostic solutions for transplant recipients.
Support assay development and validation projects.
Interface with cross-functional teams including bioinformatics, biostatistics, data science, clinical and lab operations.
Apply molecular biology methods for nucleic acid characterization and applications.
Write validation reports, standard operating procedures, and study-specific work instructions.
Disposal of biohazardous materials, chemical waste, sharp and other potentially hazardous materials according to policy.
Lead design, development, and execution of research projects with little to no assistance from senior management.
Prepare data for presentation at scientific meetings or for client presentations.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree required, Advanced degree preferred in microbiology, immunology, biology, biochemistry, molecular biology, or a related field.
